resources.string: Isitoreji se-SHIELD sigcwele. Susa amafayela athile ukuze kuvuleke isikhala.
Izinketho ze-SHIELD
I-SHIELD izocima.
Izinketho ze-SHIELD

Ivumela uhlelo ukuba lufunde imiyalezo yama-SMS egcinwe kwi-SHIELD noma ikhadi le-SIM lakho. Lokhu kuvumela uhlelo ukuba lufunde yonke imiyalezo yama-SMS, kungakhathaliseki ukuthi iquketheni noma imfihlo yayo.
Ivumela uhlelo ukuba lubhale imiyalezo yama-SMS egcinwe kwi-SHIELD noma ekhadini le-SIM lakho. Izinhlelo ezonakalisayo zingase zisuse imiyalezo yakho.
Ivumela uhlelo ukuba luthumele izenzakalo zakho (ukucindezelwa kokhiye, njll.) kwezinye izinhlelo. Izinhlelo ezonakalisayo zingase zisebenzise lokhu ukulawula i-SHIELD.
Ivumela uhlelo ukuba lwenze izingxenze ezithile zalo ziphikelele kwimemori. Lokhu kungayenza ibe nomkhawulo imemori etholakala kwezinhle izinhlelo futhi kwenze i-SHIELD yenze kancane.

Ivumela uhlelo ukuba lukhulule isitoreji se-SHIELD ngokususa amafayela ezinhlwini zemibhalo zesikhashana zezinye izinhlelo. Lokhu kungabangela ukuba ezinye izinhlelo ziqale kancane kancane njengoba kudingeka ziphinde zilande idatha yazo.

Ivumela uhlelo ukuba lufunde kumafayela okungena ahlukene esistimu. Lokhu kuvumela ukuba ithole ukwaziswa okuvamile ngalokho okwenzayo nge-SHIELD, cishe okuhlanganisa ukwaziswa kwakho siqhu noma kwangasese.

Ivumela uhlelo ukuba luguquke kungakhathaliseki ukuthi ingxenye yolunye uhlelo iyasebenza yini noma cha. Izinhlelo ezonakalisayo zingase zisebenzise lokhu ukuyekisa amakhono abalulekile e-SHIELD. Kumele kusetshenziswe ukucophelela ngale mvume, ngoba kungenzeka ukwenza izingxenye zohlelo zibe sesimweni sokungasebenzi, sokushintshashintsha, noma sokungasimami.

Ivumela uhlelo lokusebenza ukuthi luziqalise ngokushesha emuva kokuba isistimu isiqedile ukubhutha. Lokhu kungenza ukuthi kuthathe isikhathi esithe ukuba side ukuqalisa i-SHIELD nokuvumela uhlelo ukuthi lunciphise ukusebenza kwe-SHIELD ngokuthi luhlale lusebenza.

Ivumela uhlelo lokusebenza ukuthumela ukusakaza okunamathelayo, okusalayo emva kokuba ukusakazwa sekuphelile. Ukusebenzisa kakhulu kungase kwenze i-SHIELD ingasheshi noma ingahlali kahle ngokuyibangela ukusebenzisa imemori eningi kakhulu.

Ivumela uhlelo lokusebenza ukufunda idatha mayelana noxhumana nabo abalondolozwe kwi-SHIELD yakho, kufaka phakathi nobuningi obushayele, wathumela i-imeyili, noma oxhumene nabo ngezinye izindlela nomuntu oyedwa. Le mvume ivumela izinhlelo zokusebenza ukulondoloza idatha yoxhumana nabo, izinhlelo zokusebenza ezingalungile zingaba idatha yokuxhumana ngaphandle kolwazi lakho.

Ivumela uhlelo ukuba luguqule idatha mayelana noxhumana nabo abalondolozwe kwi-SHIELD yakho, kufaka phakathi nobuningi obushayele, wathumela i-imeyili, noma oxhumene nabo ngezinye izindlela nomuntu oyedwa. Le mvume ivumela izinhlelo zokusebenza ukususa idatha yoxhumana nabo.

Ivumela uhlelo lokusebenza ukufunda irekhodi lwamakholi e-SHIELD, kufaka phakathi idatha mayelana namakholi angenayo noma aphumayo. Le mvume ivumela izinhlelo zokusebenza ukulondoloza idatha yakho yerekhodi lwamakholi, nezinhlelo zokusebenza ezingalungile zongaba idatha yerekhodi lwamakholi ngaphandle kolwazi lakho.

Ivumela uhlelo lokusebenza ukushintsha irekhodi lwamakholi e-SHIELD, kufaka phakathi idatha mayelana namakholi angenayo noma aphumayo. Izinhlelo zikusebenza ezingalungile zingasebenzisa lokhu ukusula noma ukushintsha irekhodi lwamakholi wakho.

Ivumela uhlelo lokusebenza ukuthi lifunde zonke izenzakalo zekhalenda kwi-SHIELD yakho, kufaka phakathi nezabangane noma labo osebenza nabo. Lokhu kungavumela uhlelo ukwabelana noma ukulondoloza idatha yakho esekhalendeni, kungakhathaliseki ukuba yimfihlo noma ukuba bucayi baleyonto.

Ivumela uhlelo lokusebenza ukungeza, ukususa, ukushintsha izehlakalo ongazishintsha kwi-SHIELD yakho, kufaka phakathi nalezo zabangani noma labo osebenza nabo. Lokhu kungavumela uhlelo lokusebenza ukuthumela imilayezo ebonakala ngathi ivela kubanikazi bekhalenda, noma lishintshe izehlakalo ngaphandle kolwazi labanikazi.
lwenze i-SHIELD ingabe isasebenza unomphelo
Ivumela uhlelo ukuba lwenze i-SHIELD ingabe isasebenza unomphelo. Lokhu kuyingozi kakhulu.
kuphoqelela ukuqalisa phansi kwe-SHIELD.
Ivumela uhlelo lokusebenza ukuphoqelela i-SHIELD ukuqalisa phansi.
ngokuqondile qalisa ukumisa i-SHIELD nge-CDMA
gwema i-SHIELD ukuba ingalali
Ivumela uhlelo lokusebenza ukuthi linqande i-SHIELD ukuthi ilale.
amandla e-SHIELD avuliwe noma avaliwe
Ivumela uhlelo lokusebenza ukuvala noma ukuvula i-SHIELD.
shintsha i-NVIDIA Tegra CPU
Ivumela uhlelo ukuba lushintshe imikhawulo ye-NVIDA Tegra CPU. Lokhu kungase kudle amandla engeziwe.
Yisebenzise njengokuhlola komkhiqizi wezinga eliphansi, uvumela ukufinyelela okugcwele ihadiwe ye-SHIELD. Itholakala kuphela lapho i-SHIELD isebenza kwimodi yokuhlola yomkhiqizi.
Ivumela uhlelo ukuthi luguqule isikhathi esikwi-SHIELD.
Ivumela uhlelo ukuthi luguqule umkhawulo wesikhathi okwi-SHIELD.
Ivumela uhlelo lokusebenza ukuthola uhlu lwama-akhawunti aziwa i-SHIELD. Lokhu kufaka phakathi noma yimaphi ama-akhawunti adalwe izinhlelo zokusebenza ozifakile.

Ivumela uhlelo lokusebenza ukuthola amaphakethe athunyelwe kuwo onke amadivayisi kunethiwekhi ye-Wi-Fi asebenzisa amakheli amaningi okusakaza, hhayi nje i-SHIELD yakho. Isebenzisa amandla aminingi ukudlula imodi okungeyona yokusakaza okuningi.
Ivumela uhlelo lokusebenza ukumisa i-SHIELD ye-Bluetooth yasendawni, nokuthola nokubhanqanisa namadivaysi okulawula okukude.
Ivumela uhlelo ukuba luxhume kwi-SHIELD futhi lunqamule i-SHIELD kusuka kumanethiweki e-WiMAX.
Ivumela uhlelo lokusebenza ukubuka ukucushwa kwe-Bluetooth kuSHIELD, nokwenza futhi nokwamukela uxhumo namadivayisi amatanisiwe.
Bheka inani lamaphasiwedi angafanele athayishiwe uma kuvulwa iskrini bese kuvalwa i-SHIELD noma kususwe yonke idatha ye-SHIELD uma kubhalwe amaphasiwedi amaningi angalungile.
Sula idatha ye-SHIELD ngaphandle kwesaziso ngokwenza ukusetha kabusha idatha kwemboni.
Alikho ikhadi le-SIM kwi-SHIELD.

Udwebe iphathini yakho yokuvula ngendlela engafanele izikhathi ezingu-%d. Ngemva %d kweminye imizamo engaphumelelanga, uzocelwa ukuvula i-SHIELD yakho usebenzisa ukungena ngemvume kwi-Google.\n\nSicela uzame futhi kwengu- %d imizuzwana.

Uzame ngokusebenzisa indlela engafanele ukuvula i-SHIELD izikhathi ezingu-%d. Ngemva %d kokuzama kaningana okungaphumelelanga, i-SHIELD izobuyela kwizimo zasembonini futhi yonke imininingwane yomsebenzisi izolahleka.
Uzame ngokusebenzisa indlela engafanele ukuvula i-SHIELD izikhathi ezingu-%d. I-SHIELD manje seyizosethwa kabusha ibe yizimiso zasembonini.

Ivumela uhlelo lokusebenza ukushintsha umlando wesiphequluli noma wamabhukhimakhi olondolozwe kwi-SHIELD. Lokhu kungavumela uhlelo lokusebenza ukususa noma ukushintsha idatha yesiphequluli. Phawula: le mvume kungenzeka ingaphoqelelwa iziphequluli ezivela eceleni noma ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza ezinamandla okuphequlula iwebhu.
%1$s ifuna ukunika amandla i-Explore by Touch. Uma i-Explore by Touch ikhanya, ungezwa noma ubone izincazelo ezingaphansi komunwe wakho noma wenze izenzo zomzimba ukuze uxhumane ne-SHIELD.
I-SHIELD

Uzame ngokusebenzisa indlela engafanele ukuvula i-SHIELD izikhathi ezingu-%d. Ngemva %d kokuzama kaningana okungaphumelelanga, i-SHIELD izobuyela kwizimo zasembonini futhi yonke imininingwane yomsebenzisi izolahleka.
Uzame ngokusebenzisa indlela engafanele ukuvula i-SHIELD izikhathi ezingu-%d. I-SHIELD manje seyizosethwa kabusha ibe yizimiso zasembonini.

Udwebe iphathini yakho yokuvula ngendlela engafanele izikhathi ezingu-%d. Ngemva %d kweminye imizamo engaphumelelanga, uzocelwa ukuvula i-SHIELD yakho usebenzisa i-akhawunti ye-imeyli.\n\n Zama futhi emasekhondini angu-%d.
Lala
